sile.mr: Akar dapanim: God a ginabazɨ an Ekiamɨn oto, a Krais.
sile.s1: Akar kam, an Aposelbar Ingangaribar Akɨnafarimɨn aven iti.

twocol.p: Ezɨ Pita 11 plan aposelba ko tughav ikia, egha a gumazamiziba pamtem kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia Judaba koma Jerusalemɨn itir gumazamiziba, ia bar deraghvɨram na baragh. Kɨ bizir otozir kamɨn gun ia mɨkemeghtɨma, ia a gɨfogham.
“Ezɨ kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia Israelia ia bar bizir kam gɨfo, ia mɨsuegha ter ighuvimɨn gurazir Iesusɨn kam, datɨrɨghɨn God a gamizɨ an Ekiamɨn oto, a Krais, God Uam E Iniasa Mɨsevezir Gumazim.”
Egha gumazamiziba Pitan akam barasi, a men navibagh kuizɨ, me kamaghɨn Pita koma aposelɨn igharazibav gei, “En aveghbuaba, e manmaghɨn damuam?”

Ezɨ Pita kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia bar navibagh iragh Krais Iesusɨn ziamɨn rueghtɨ a ian arazir kuraba gɨn amangtɨ, God uan Duam ia danɨngam. God fomɨra akam akɨrigha ghaze, a uan Duam ia danigam, ia koma, ian boriba koma, ian saghon itir darasi, me bar. God, en Ekiam, gumazamizir a men diaziba, a uan Duam me danɨngam.”

Egha Pita mɨgɨrɨgɨar avɨribar me gamuava akar gavgavir maba sara me mɨkeme, “Ia uari uarir akuragh, eghtɨ God dughiar kamɨn gumazamizir kurar kabagh asɨghasɨghɨva uaghan ia gasɨgasɨghan kogham.” Ezɨma gumazamizir avɨriba an akam baregha a gifuegha, egha rue. Ezɨ dughiar kamnagh God ua 3,000ɨn gumazamizir maba ua me inizɨma me Kraisɨn adarazir aven ize.

sile.q1: Ikiavɨra Itir God, a gumazir uan sipsipba deragha dagh eghuva dar garimɨn mɨn iti.
sile.q2: A kamaghɨra deragha na geghuva nan gari.
sile.q1: A na inigha ghua grazir aghuiba itir danganimɨn na atɨzɨ, kɨ dagh isɨn irav iti.

sile.q2: A uan iziar ekiam bangɨn, a fomɨra mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, a na inigha tuavir aghuibara zui.

Ezɨ nan itarim, bar izɨvagha fasfagha iri.

sile.q2: Eghtɨ kɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam.

sile.mr: Akar dapanim: Ia bar moghɨra mati sipsipba tintinibar arui. Ezɨ ia datɨrɨghɨn uamategha Sipsipba Geghuvir Gumazim bagha ize, a deraghavɨra ian duabagh eghufi.
sile.s1: Akar kam, akɨnafarir faragha zuim, Pita an osirizimɨn aven iti.

twocol.p: Egh ia arazir kuram damutɨ me ia mɨsoghtɨ, ia mɨzazim inigh tugh gavgavigham, ian arazir kurar kamɨn ivezir aghuiba puvatɨ. Egh ia arazir aghuim damutɨ, me ia mɨsoghtɨma ia mɨzazim inigh tugh gavgavigham, eghtɨ God arazir aghuim ia damuam.
Krais mɨzazim inigha ian akura, kamaghɨn God Kraisɨn arazir kamɨn gɨn mangasa ian dia. Egha a uan arazir amizir kam en aka, eghtɨ e an gɨn mangam.
twocol.q: “Krais arazir kuratam gamizir puvatɨ, egha uaghan akar ifavaritam mɨkemezir puvatɨ.”
twocol.p: Ezɨ me akar kurabar a mɨgeima, a men akatam ikarazir puvatɨ, egha a mɨzazim inigha paza me damuasa me mɨgeir puvatɨ. A uabɨ isa jas ganɨngi, jas a God. A fo, kar jasɨn bar deravɨra bizibar tuisɨzim. Ezɨ Krais en arazir kuraba isa uan mɨkarzim gatɨgha, egha ter ighuvimɨn areme. A kamagh sua, e arazir kuraba bar ada ateghɨva, angamra ikɨva arazir aghuibar amuam, kamaghɨn an areme. Me a mɨsoghezɨma an mɨzazir dafar kam ia gamima, ia ua dera.
Ia bar sipsipbar mɨn tintinibar ghuegha ovenge. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn ia uamategha sipsipbar garir gumazim bagha ize, a ian duabagh eghuvir gumazim.

sile.p3: Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Kɨ uabɨ sipsipbagh eghuvir gumazir aghuim. Kɨ uan sipsipbagh fo, ezɨ nan sipsipba na gɨfo.”."
sile.mr: Akar dapanim: Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, kɨ uabɨ sipsipbar tiar akam.
sile.s1: Ia, Krais Iesusɨn Akar Aghuir Jon osirizim, a baragh.

twocol.p: Egha Iesus ua kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Bar guizbangɨra kɨ ia mɨgei, gumazim sipsipbar dɨvazimɨn tiar akamɨn aven zuir puvatɨgha, egha tuavir igharazimɨn dɨvazimɨn ikiavkɨnigha egha aven ghua, a mati okɨmakɨar gumazim egha gumazir igharaz darazir biziba isim. Ezɨ gumazir tiar akamɨn aven zuim, a sipsipbagh eghuvir gumazim. Tiar akamɨn garir gumazim a gumazir kam bagha tiam kui. Ezɨ sipsipba an tiarim barasi. Ezɨ a vaghvagha uabɨ uan sipsipbar ziabar diava egha men akua azenan zui. A uan sipsipbar akua azenan ghugha, egha a uabɨ men faragha zui. Ezɨ sipsipba an tiarim barasi. Kamaghɨn me an gɨn zui. Me gumazir igharazibar gɨn zuir puvatɨ. Me gumazir igharazibar tiaribagh fozir puvatɨ. Kamaghɨn ami, gumazir igharazim men dɨmtɨ, sipsipba an aregham.” Iesus akar isɨn zuimɨn me mɨkeme, ezɨ me akar kamɨn mɨngarim, me a gɨfozir puvatɨ.

Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Iesus ua kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kɨ bar guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, kɨ uabɨ, kɨ sipsipba aven zuir tiar akam. Gumazir nan faragha izeziba, me bar okɨmakɨar gumaziba egha gumazibar biziba isir gumaziba. Ezɨ sipsipba me barazir puvatɨ. Kɨ uabɨ kɨ tiar akam. Ezɨ gumazitam na bagh izɨva egh dɨvazimɨn aven mangɨghtɨ, God an akurvagham. Eghtɨ an aven mangɨghɨva egh azenan izam, egh daruva dagheba iniam.

“Okɨmakɨar gumazim, a sipsipba okɨmɨva me mɨsoghtɨma me arɨmɨghiram, egh me gasɨghasɨghasa izi. A bizir igharazitam damuasa izir puvatɨ. Ezɨ ko, kɨ ia angamra itir ikɨrɨmɨrim iniasa, kɨ ize, eghtɨ ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim guizbangɨra ia gizɨvagham.
